airports.name: Gunnison-Crested Butte Regional Airport
airports.description: Closest airport to Crested Butte. Flights are extremely limited, book early! Free bus from the airport to Downtown.

airports.name: Montrose Regional Airport
airports.description: Scenic drive with sightseeing opportunity for the Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park nearby!!

airports.name: Denver International Airport
airports.description: Most flight options and best prices. Beautiful mountain drive but long journey.

driving_tips: Rental car recommended for mountain driving and local flexibility
There is a free bus available between Crested Butte Downtown and the Mountain Village - Mountain Express
Be aware that gas stations are extremely limited in some parts of Colorado

hotels.name: Vaquera House
hotels.description: Luxury boutique hotel in downtown Crested Butte with modern amenities and stunning mountain views. Walking distance to restaurants and shops.

hotels.name: Elk Mountain Lodge
hotels.description: Cozy mountain lodge offering comfortable accommodations with rustic charm. Features heated pool, hot tub, and continental breakfast.

hotels.name: Old Town Inn
hotels.description: Historic inn in the heart of Crested Butte offering affordable rooms with authentic mountain character. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers.

registry.message: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all, however if you'd like to honor us with a gift we've provided registry options below. We're thankful to have most of what we need, so honeymoon fund is preferred.

stores.name: Honeymoon Fund
stores.description: Help us create amazing memories on our honeymoon

stores.name: Registry
stores.description: Traditional wedding gifts we'd love to receive
